Baby Exclusive. Long-sleeved, wrapover bodysuits in soft pima cotton jersey with press-studs down one side and at the crotch.
Set with a top and trousers. Long-sleeved top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a soft brushed inside. Jersey trousers with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Baby Exclusive. Swimsuit in UV-protective material with short sleeves and a zip down the front. Lined. UPF 50.

Top in soft cotton jersey with short, smocked sleeves with a flounce trim, and gathers in the sides for best fit.
Block-coloured, knee-length swim shorts in woven fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a welt back pocket with a hook and loop fastener. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Short skirt in imitation leather with an embroidered motif on the front, visible zip at the back and raw-edge hem. Lined.

Short-sleeved bodysuit in soft cotton jersey with a sewn-on bow tie at the top and press-studs on one shoulder and at the crotch. Sewn-on waistcoat in woven fabric with a decorative chest pocket, sewn-in handkerchief and buttons down the front.
Sleeveless jersey dress with a shimmering metallic pattern, straps that cross at the back of the neck and an elasticated seam at the waist. Unlined.
Short skirt in a textured weave containing glittery threads with a concealed zip in the side and two flounces to the hem with frayed edges. Lined.

Knee-length dress in embroidered airy chiffon with a collar and opening at the front with decorative ties. Short, frill-trimmed puff sleeves, a concealed zip in the side, seam at the waist and gently flared skirt. Unlined. The polyester content of the dress is partly recycled.

Dress in a soft weave with embroidery and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. 3/4-length sleeves with a seam, a seam at the hem and a wide, gathered flounce at the cuffs and hem. Unlined.
Short dress in a patterned weave with short sleeves and a concealed zip at the back.

Calf-length dress in airy, patterned chiffon with a collar and lace-trimmed button placket. Long sleeves with a frill trim at the cuffs, a seam at the waist and a lace seam at the knees with decorative gathers. Jersey underdress.
Henley shirt in cotton jersey with a button placket.
Henley shirt in cotton jersey with a button placket.
Henley shirt in cotton jersey with a button placket.
Dress in patterned organic cotton slub jersey with press-studs at the top of each side, short, frill-trimmed sleeves, a seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt.
Blouse in a crêpe weave with a lace collar and a tie at the neck and buttons down the front. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and embroidery at the cuffs and hem.
Short wrapover coat in woven fabric with draped lapels, a concealed press-stud, pockets in the side seams, a single back vent and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Patterned lining.

Velvet skater skirt with velvet-covered elastication at the waist.
Jumper in a fine-knit cotton blend containing glittery threads with long sleeves and knitted flounces at the cuffs.
Long-sleeved top in patterned mesh with a small stand-up collar and opening with a button at the back of the neck. The top is layered over a sewn-in jersey top with narrow shoulder straps.
Blouse in an airy, patterned weave with a small, frilled collar and opening at the top with a tie. Long sleeves with a tie and frill trim at the cuffs, and smocking at the hem.

Hole-knit jumper in a soft wool blend with an embroidered pattern on the front and down the sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem, and long sleeves with a frill at the cuffs.
Cardigan in soft fine knit with embroidery and buttons down the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short, imitation suede skirt with a concealed zip in the side and a laser-cut, hole-patterned, scalloped hem. Lined.
5-pocket trousers in patterned stretch twill with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and slim legs.

Short skirt in imitation patent leather with a tab and press-studs at the top and a visible zip at the front. Lined.
Imitation leather trainers with a soft, stretchy edge and tongue in scuba fabric. Elasticated lacing at the front, a loop front and back, mesh insoles and rubber soles.
